description:
A simple plugin to resize images on the server side.

It relies on the sharp Node module.

You can see how to use the plugin on:
https://bubble.io/page?name=index&id=imageresizer-26427
name: ImageResizer
plugin_instructions:
The plugin contains a single action: Resize image.

Use this action in a workflow to resize an image. The width and the height of the new image must be specified, as well as whether to preserve aspect ratio.
